caption.p: Effect of nitrogen source (A) and carbon source (B) on FAMES profile of C. oleaginosus. Other constitute fatty acids present below 1% of total profile, including C12:0, C14:0, C18:3, C20:0, C20:1, C20:3, C22:0, C24:0 for (A) and C12:0, C14:0, C18:3, C20:0, C20:1, C20:3, C22:0, C24:0 for (B).
